sequence_id.description: The command sequence_id as generated by the CSC.

azimuth.description: Mount azimuth angle at the specified time. The allowed range is the software limits (L1), approximately -270 to 270.

azimuthVelocity.description: Mount azimuth velocity at the specified time.

elevation.description: Mount elevation angle at the specified time.

elevationVelocity.description: Mount elevation angle velocity at the specified time.

nasmyth1RotatorAngle.description: Nasmyth 1 rotator angle at the specified time. The allowed range is the software limits (L1), approximately -170 to 170. Outside this range the velocity will be severly limited. Software position limits are -175 to 175.

nasmyth1RotatorAngleVelocity.description: Nasmyth 1 rotator angle velocity at the specified time.

nasmyth2RotatorAngle.description: Nasmyth 1 rotator angle at the specified time. The allowed range is the software limits (L1), approximately -170 to 170. Outside this range the velocity will be severly limited. Software position limits are -175 to 175.

nasmyth2RotatorAngleVelocity.description: Nasmyth 1 rotator angle velocity at the specified time.

taiTime.description: TAI date at which the commanded positions and velocities apply, as unix time.

trackId.description: Target identifier provided by the ATMCS.

tracksys.description: Defines tracking coordinate system as sidereal, non-sidereal or local.

radesys.description: Coordinate reference frame of RA/DEC axes. This originates from the pointing component and is used for WCS definition (e.g. FK5 or ICRS).
